ISSUE.TITLE: When a filter has no values it shows -1
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary When a filter has no values it shows -1. Should probably just say "No Values" or something of that sort. ### Steps to Reproduce https://redash-preview.netlify.com/queries/151/source
